answers.answer: No , when I took my 1 hr test I failed it also, but after doing the 3hr test it came back normal .

Just depends I failed both and now have to watch my diet and check my glucose levels 4 times a day or 27 weeks going to rough to maintain my levels but working hard so I won't have to be put on medication
Ugh!!!!! Thanks ladies im 25 weeks and its going to be super hard to maintain  a healthy  diet especially  in the summer!!!! I hope i pass the second  time!!!!
You had to fast for the test? I had my test today and didn't have to fast. I just had to be sure not to eat something real sweet.
Oh wow you are suppose to fast for both test is what I was told and that is what did

I just took my glucose test last week & I did not have to fast at all they just said don't ear or f drink any thing too sugary, I have only heard you have to fast for the 3 hour test if a person failed the 1 hour test you should google it
I couldn't eat after 12am my appointment was at 9am and I had to take it one hr prior.. They gave me the bottle to take home... I always thought u had to fast but every doc is different
It was on the lab paperwork given to me that I could not eat I had to fast for my one hour I guess all docs do it differently

They told me i didnt have to fast for the 1hour test but i did anyways and i still failed it because  they said the results  came back high and now i do have to fast 12 -14 hours im nervous because  i really  dont want to be a diabetic

I know you don't I didn't either but I am and just taking it one day at a time following the meal plan and testing my sugar 4 times a day stinks but doesnt hurt as long as you maintain your sugar levels you won't have to take medication stay positive

question: I fasted For 12+hours on friday and Saturday  i took my 1hour glucose test and i got my results  today and my blood sugar levels are high so Now i have to fast for 12+hours again and do my 3hour glucose test againDoes this basically mean im most likely  a gestational  diabetic??????PLEASE HELP!!!!!
title: PLEASE HELP DO I HAVE GESTATIONAL DIABETES
